attributes.action: Encourage BT/OPENREACH to allow sharing of their poles & underground ducts with Community Broadband High Speed Fibre Cable  Projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BT fasten their telephone cables to electricity poles in North Yorkshire and elsewhere, yet refuse to allow others to fasten cables to their poles and underground ducts.
This policy is restricting the development and installation of fibre cable networks in areas which BT are unable or unwilling to provide an NGA ( Next Generation Access) broadband service from 5Mb up to 1000 Mb or indeed any broadband service.

This would be a major factor in solving the Digital Divide problem for Digital Britain.
Please sign this petition. Thank you.
